About

Hi, my name is Alfonso Santamaria I consider myself a self-taught person, with many interests, very neat and tidy when it comes to my codes and also very perfectionist with my work. I like dealing with people and especially teaching and transmitting knowledge.

I enjoy playing soccer, video games and read books.

Experience

Corporate Security Consultants

IT Deparment

2015 to 2016, I worked as a Corporate Security Consultant primarily within the IT department. My responsibilities encompassed overseeing security and accounting functions, ensuring efficient and effective administration. This involved managing information storage, classification, cybersecurity measures, and cataloging.

Allied Global

Back-office Support Staff

2017 to 2019 Fluent in both Spanish and English, I managed customer interactions daily, providing detailed, personalized, friendly, and polite service. My goal was to ensure customer satisfaction by addressing their inquiries and concerns effectively and professionally.

Freelance

Graphic Design & Web Development

2019 to 2021 In graphic design, I gained experience in creating advertisements, posters for artists, and generating content. Additionally, I worked as a web developer, proficient in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, contributing to the development of various websites during this time.

Startek

Customer Service & Trainer

2020 to 2021, As part of my role, I memorized all company products and services to swiftly and efficiently address customer inquiries. Additionally, I excelled in making upsells by leveraging my comprehensive knowledge of the products and services offered. My aim was to provide exceptional customer service while also maximizing sales opportunities.
